highlights: Developing new web and mobile scrapers to collect store and product listing data from major grocers and retailers, while standardizing existing scrapers to better enable test-driven development and faster debugging.
Deeply diving into a diverse range of mobile and web architectures, utilizing extensive proxy systems, reverse engineering, headless browsing, etc.
Architected, implemented, deployed, and maintained large scale Spark pipelines and machine learning models to generate core data products and predict audience demographics and customer segments.
Released investigations of our data using Jupyter notebooks and Django dashboards.
Founded a Shanghai-based education consultancy and led a team of counselors, marketers, and account managers serving Shanghai's top students studying abroad.
Provided long-term, holistic, and honest academic planning and guidance.
